Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute near State/Chicago
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses temp. rerouted NB: State, Chicago, Dearborn, and Division; SB: Clark, Chicago, and State: due to, fire dept. activity near State/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses temporarily rerouted in both directions due to, fire department activity near State/Chicago.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Chicago, Dearborn, and Division.

Southbound buses will operate via Clark, Chicago, and State.

Allow extra travel time.
